name: New Edition
description:
You start as the new editor of a 60s newspaper after a leadership election to bring Lord Redmond of the Leadership party to become PM, under the backdrop of a great fog coming in over London. You’re newspaper has the power to dictate who wins power and how the fog is handled. However you have to stay relevant and in float during your first 7 weeks.

Controls

Enter/Space - Next Conversation

Mouse Click - Pick Up Stories

Mouse Drag - Move Stories

Mouse Release - Drop/Place Stories
